entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
